attributes.name: accordion-title
attributes.description: Title of accordion item

attributes.name: action-bar-content
attributes.description: The content of the action bar

attributes.name: alignment
attributes.description: Position of icon

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Whether or not the item is expanded by default

attributes.name: alignment
attributes.description: Alignment of button content

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Wether the button is disabled or not

attributes.name: full-height
attributes.description: Whether or not the button should fill the height of its parent

attributes.name: full-width
attributes.description: Whether or not the button should fill the width of its parent

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: icon to be used in button (if layout necessitates)

attributes.name: icon-position
attributes.description: position of the icon relative to the text

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: button layout: icon only button, icon with label or label only

attributes.name: no-border-radius
attributes.description: give the button square borders

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size of the button

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of button (corresponds to type property of native html button)

attributes.name: variation
attributes.description: color theme to be applied to the button e.g primary

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: the state of the checkbox 'true' 'false' or 'indeterminate'

attributes.name: disable-checkbox
attributes.description: wether or not the checkbox is disabled

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: text label for our checkbox

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description: the positioning for the label 'top', 'right', 'left', or 'bottom'

attributes.name: button-one-text
attributes.description: text to show in the dialog button

attributes.name: button-one-type
attributes.description: the btn-type property for button one

attributes.name: button-one-variation
attributes.description: the variation property for button one

attributes.name: button-two-text
attributes.description: text to show in the dialog button

attributes.name: button-two-type
attributes.description: the btn-type property for button Two

attributes.name: button-two-variation
attributes.description: the variation property for button Two

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: header of the dialog

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: text body of the dialog

attributes.name: tippy-instance
attributes.description: reference to the instance resulting from the initialization of tippy

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: type of message being displayed by the dialog box

attributes.name: dismissable
attributes.description: Whether the contextual box is dismissable

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: The duration of the message in milliseconds

attributes.name: instructions
attributes.description: Instructions found in the body of the contextual box

attributes.name: is-visible
attributes.description: Whether or not the contextual box should be visible

attributes.name: message-title
attributes.description: The title message

attributes.name: variation
attributes.description: The variation of the contextual box

attributes.name: align-right
attributes.description: Whether or not the dropdown should align from the right side

attributes.name: full-width
attributes.description: Whether or not the dropdown should be full width

attributes.name: has-icons
attributes.description: Whether or not Dropdown items has icon

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The name of the icon to be used as button trigger

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Title to be displayed on dropdown

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The width of the dropdown container

attributes.name: sub-heading
attributes.description: Subheading to be displayed under name

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the group

attributes.name: has-icon
attributes.description: Whether or not item has icon

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Link item should link to

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon to be displayed to left of the text

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Target describing how the link should be opened

attributes.name: breadcrumb
attributes.description: Breadcrumb string

attributes.name: header-message
attributes.description: Message to shown beneath header

attributes.name: image-url
attributes.description: URl of logo to be used in header

attributes.name: left-menu-title
attributes.description: The title of the left menu

attributes.name: user-menu-title
attributes.description: The title of the user dropdown

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: icon color

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: icon name

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the icon

attributes.name: preload
attributes.description: comma seperated values representing any images to be preloaded

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: theme to be applied to the button

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: width of the svg

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: autofocus on element

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: wether input is disabled

attributes.name: error-msg
attributes.description: this sets the default error message when the invalid reason is not known or accounted for

attributes.name: feedback-i-d
attributes.description: maximum length of the input field

attributes.name: form
attributes.description: the form to attach this input to

attributes.name: form-id
attributes.description: id to be applied to input field

attributes.name: full-width
attributes.description: wether to stretch the width to fit the container

attributes.name: help-text
attributes.description: small help text to be shown below input field

attributes.name: help-text-i-d
attributes.description: maximum length of the input field

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon to be displayed inside the input field

attributes.name: icon-placement
attributes.description: icon placement

attributes.name: is-active
attributes.description: Attribute to trigger active style on input

attributes.name: is-invalid
attributes.description: Whether or not the state of the input should be invalid

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: label text to be associated with input (both visually and accessibility wise)

attributes.name: label-i-d
attributes.description: maximum length of the input field

attributes.name: label-props
attributes.description: Properties/attributes to pass to label

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: maximum length of the input field

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: id to be given to input element

attributes.name: pattern-name
attributes.description: name of regex pattern to be applied to input's pattern field

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: placeholder for input

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: wether input is required

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: wether input is required

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: type of input field

attributes.name: validate-on-blur
attributes.description: Whether or not to validate input on blur

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: current value of the input element

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: placement of the tooltip

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: tooltip text

attributes.name: tippy-instance
attributes.description: reference to the instance resulting from the initialization of tippy

attributes.name: children-field
attributes.description: Name of field containing children

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Whether tree should be expanded by default

attributes.name: group-field
attributes.description: Name of group field

attributes.name: paginate
attributes.description: Whether or not to paginate data

attributes.name: row-height
attributes.description: Height of rows

attributes.name: row-selection
attributes.description: Type of selection to be used in tree

attributes.name: tree-height
attributes.description: The desired height of the element

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The title of wizard

attributes.name: skip-intro
attributes.description: skip over the initial page with "start process" button

attributes.name: sub-heading
attributes.description: The subHeading of wizard

attributes.description: Whether step is active

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The title of the wizard step

attributes.description: The subtitle of the wizard step
